pullrequest.title: Added npm-shrinkwrap to lock versions of upstream node packages

content.html:
I'm setting up CI for 1.3.0 on branch pipelines_1.3.

By commit 04d34fa, I can reproduce the issue this is trying to solve, see here:

#!/osrf/gzweb/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/36

Then on commit 531ff56 I copied your shrinkwrap into that branch, but now I get new errors:

#!/osrf/gzweb/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/37

I used node 0.12 on the CI, any ideas what I'm missing?
